LanguageData.JRWSupersaurus.label: Supersaurus
LanguageData.JRWSupersaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03927-1985 [SUPERSAURUS VIVIANAE] CODENAME: MONUMENT >908
A beautiful sauropod with a jade-like hide. Gathering in large herds, these massive creatures spend the majority of the day grazing to sate their hearty appetite.
